mapper.select: SELECT id, name, subtitle, price, original_price, main_image, sold_count, unit, is_recommended, is_hot, is_new FROM product WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY id , create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT id, name, subtitle, description, price, original_price, main_image, sold_count, stock, unit, is_recommended, is_hot, is_new, origin_place, brand, shelf_life, delivery_type, min_purchase, max_purchase FROM product WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 1
